title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 26
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 26
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his Chart of the Day "Small caps seen leading U.S. capital-spending revival." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.\u0010\u0010Oshrat Carmiel\u0010Real Estate Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing Hamptons buyers forgoing mansions for smaller homes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
